sentences.english: You can manifest psionic powers more powerful than the normal limits of manifestation.
sentences.chinese: 你可以展现比普通极限更强的灵能。

sentences.english: Well, what do we know about extremes of chemical reactivity?
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我们对化学反应的极限有那些了解呢？

sentences.english: The complementarity between two factories play a co-production functions to the greatest limit.
sentences.chinese: 工厂之间的互辅及合作生产功能发挥到最大的极限。

sentences.english: "Action sports is the fastest-growing segment of our business," says Jeanne Jackson, who runs Nike's direct-to-consumer business.
sentences.chinese: 极限运动用品是我们增长速度最快的业务部门。

sentences.english: Dream is endless, vigour is infinite .
sentences.chinese: 梦想无止境，活力无极限。

sentences.english: If Battier health back, no doubt the sky is the limit of this rocket.
sentences.chinese: 如果巴蒂尔健康复出，无疑天空才是这支火箭的极限。

sentences.english: Hey, Rod, maybe, you shouldn't fight that this week.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，罗得，也许，你不该这周去挑战极限。

sentences.english: Would you like to learn some lessons in life from the ultimate minimalist?
sentences.chinese: 你想从极限简约主义那学到一些生活中的经验吗？

sentences.english: In this paper, the method for the calculation of surface fatigue strength of W N gears is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了双圆弧齿轮接触疲劳极限的计算方法。

sentences.english: The velocity of light is the ultimate speed limit, being part of the very structure of space and time.
sentences.chinese: 作为时空结构的一部分，光速是终极速度极限。

sentences.english: Second, we study the limited distribution of a bonus-malus system in an open market.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，研究开放市场环境下奖惩系统的极限分布。

sentences.english: ExtremeProgramming requires that quality goals for products be set via the FunctionalTests.
sentences.chinese: 极限程序设计要求通过功能测试为产品设置质量目标。

sentences.english: Stiffening rib of web can enhance limit temperature of end-plate connections.
sentences.chinese: 加劲肋的存在提高了端板连接节点的极限温度。

sentences.english: I have a Korea friend , who help me made some beautiful MC.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个帮我做这些漂亮的极限片的韩国朋友。

sentences.english: This paper describes the lower bound theory of 3-D plastic limit analysis.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了三维塑性极限分析下限法的基本原理。

definition: to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
to break through/to make a breakthrough/to surmount or break the back of (a task etc)/(of ball sports) to break through a defense
to reach great heights (in technical skills or scholastic achievements)
